text: The 1784 English cricket season was the 13th in which matches have been awarded retrospective first-class cricket status. The scorecard of only one first-class match has survived. == Matches == A single first-class match scorecard survives from 1784.Association of Cricket Statisticians and Historians (ACS) (1981) A Guide to Important Cricket Matches Played in the British Isles 1709 – 1863. Nottingham: ACS.Results, English Domestic Season 1784, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-03-11. The match was played between an England side and a Hampshire XI at Sevenoaks Vine in June.England v Hampshire XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-04-05. ==First mentions== * J. Cole (Hampshire) * Davidson (Essex) * Jack Small ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:1784 in English cricket Category:English cricket seasons from 1764 to 1786
title: 1784 English cricket season
